title: 95/313/EC: Commission Decision of 24 July 1995 amending Decision 95/171/EC on certain protection measures with regard to apes originating in or coming from Zaire
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 24 July 1995 amending Decision 95/171/EC on certain protection measures with regard to apes originating in or coming from Zaire (Text with EEA relevance) (95/313/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 3 of Decision 95/171/EC is hereby replaced by the following:
'Article 3
This Decision shall apply until 31 October 1995.`
The Member States shall amend the measures they have adopted in respect of Zaire so that they conform to this Decision. They shall inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 July 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 56.
(2) OJ No L 112, 19. 5. 1995, p. 30.
